name: NupkgWrench
description: This tasks allows you to use NupkgWrench in your build / release
author: Dirk Schuermans

inputs.name: NupkgWrench
inputs.label: NupkgWrench executable
inputs.helpMarkDown: The full path to the NupkgWrench executable. Leave empty if you want to use the version included with this task (v1.1.0)

inputs.name: Command
inputs.label: Command
inputs.helpMarkDown: The command of NupkgWrench to run

inputs.name: SubCommand
inputs.label: Subcommand
inputs.helpMarkDown: If command is made up of subcommands, provide the subcommand here.

inputs.name: CommandArguments
inputs.label: Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide arguments for the command to run. If your argument contains spaces, make sure to include double quotes

inputs.name: CommandOptions
inputs.label: Options
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide options for the command to run. Make sure to double quote each option.
